articles.title: Pope Francis Cancels Audiences for 3rd Day Over Apparent Cold
articles.description: Pope Francis canceled official engagements for the third day in a row Saturday as he battled an apparent cold.
articles.content:
Pope Francis during Ash Wednesday Service at Santa Sabina Basilica, on Feb. 26. 
Source: Vatican Pool via Getty Images 
Vatican City (AP) -- Pope Francis canceled official engagements for the third day in a row Saturday as he battled an apparent cold.
